mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment (content, tbl_user_id, tbl_webtoon_id) VALUES (#{content}, #{userId}, #{webtoonId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_comment WHERE tbl_user_id = #{userId} AND tbl_webtoon_id = #{webtoonId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.id as id, content, u.name FROM tbl_comment c LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON c.tbl_user_id = u.id WHERE tbl_user_id != #{userId} AND tbl_webtoon_id = #{webtoonId}
